content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using pipes
-  Ensure that the pipe connection points are correctly aligned before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the fluid system is properly set up before attempting to connect pipes.

### Errors when checking boiler status
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel before checking its status.
-  Make sure that the boiler is properly connected to the offshore pump and steam engine.

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure that the target tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
-  Make sure that the entity is placed at a valid position on the map.

### Errors when connecting entities
-  Ensure that the entities are compatible and can be connected before attempting to connect them.
-  Make sure that the connection points are correctly aligned before attempting to connect entities.
